objects.text: 43" Vista Pro Ultra HD Smart LED TV
Crystal Processor 4K | Samsung Knox Security | SolarCell Remote | 20W Surround Sound

product_details.name: Samsung 108 cm (43 inches) Crystal 4K Vista Pro Ultra HD Smart LED TV UA43UE86AFULXL
product_details.description:
- Brand: Samsung.
- Model: UA43UE86AFULXL.
- Model Name: TV.
- Model Year: 2025.
- Product Dimensions: 5.97 x 96.75 x 56.14 cm; 6.8 kg.
- Memory Storage Capacity: 8 GB.
- Ram Memory Installed Size: 2 GB.
- Operating System: Tizen.
- Hardware Interface: Bluetooth, USB, Ethernet, HDMI.
- Tuner Technology: DVB-T2CS2.
- Response Time: 8 Milliseconds.
- Resolution: 3840 x 2160 Pixels.

- Special Features: Crystal Processor 4K | Slim Look | Samsung Knox Security | Endless Free Content | SolarCell Remote.

- Display Technology: LED.

- Image Aspect Ratio: 16:09.

- Supported audio formats: MPEG, MPEG4, FLAC, OGG, WMA, wav, midi, ape, AIFF , ALAC, mp3_audio.
- Speaker Surround Sound Channel Configuration: Object Tracking Sound.
- Speakers Maximum Output Power: 20 Watts.

- Voltage: 220 Volts.

- Refresh Rate: 50 Hz.
- Total USB ports: 1.
- Connector Type: Wi-Fi, USB, Ethernet, HDMI.
- Maximum Operating Distance: 15 Feet.
- Mounting Type: Table Mount and Wall Mount.
- Actual viewing angle: 178 Degrees.
- Includes remote: Yes.
- Supports Bluetooth Technology: Yes.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Item Weight: 6 kg 800 g.
- Importer: Samsung India Electronics Pvt.
- Ltd., 6th Floor, DLF Centre, Sansad Marg, New Delhi - 110001 Email us at: support.india@samsung.com Tel (Toll Free): 1800 40 7267864 (1800 40 SAMSUNG).
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 6 x 96.7 x 56.1 Centimeters.
- Net Quantity: 1 Case.
- Generic Name: Smart TV.

banner_details:
This banner promotes a high-definition 43" smart LED television with vibrant visuals and a modern, tech-inspired theme. The background features a dark purple gradient with radiant circular and wave patterns, adding dynamism and depth to the layout. The headline text layer (`heading`) in bold white font stands out prominently at the top, followed by a subheading text layer (`subheading`) in a bright purple hue that enhances visibility and brand alignment. At the center, a product image (`product_image`) showcases the television with vivid on-screen visuals. Below it, the description text layer (`description`) highlights key features in a white, slender type. A prominently displayed offer price (`price`) in bold purple captures attention, and a bright purple rectangular button (`cta_button`) with white 'BUY NOW' text (`cta`) serves as the call to action.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Purple: `#0A0A2A` (background base)
- Violet Gradient: `#3A1B6B` to `#A84FF0` (visual highlights & accents)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (text and contrast elements)
- Highlight Purple: `#A84FF0` (callouts, text highlights, button fill)
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant and futuristic visual theme dominated by glossy, crystalline bubbles in varying shades of purple. The color palette effectively blends deep ultraviolet (#3C1A7D) and electric indigo (#6A0DAD) with luminous highlights of lavender (#B57EDC) and soft pink (#FFB3FE). These tones gradually transition into one another, creating a smooth and immersive 3D effect. Accents of rich blue (#2C2C9A) enhance depth, while the bright white (#FFFFFF) text and Samsung branding pop against the darker background. This palette conveys a modern and high-definition vibe, ideal for an advertisement banner that emphasizes innovation, clarity, and luxury.
